Make sure you mention at the beginning that you want to cancel these two things, and they are from the same order. You also want to return the backpack you received with the vacuum cleaner. You also want to change your pending order address to the default Chicago one, and change its item color to red. You want to get the tracking number of your cancelled order.

Please confirm the above details and provide the missing information so I can proceed.'

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Plus, I need to change the address on my pending order to my default Chicago address and change the item color to red. Lastly, could you give me the tracking number for the cancelled order?
